text: it really works out for me because the cattle's stay in a little better shape I don't have to put as much feed to them all winter I can maintain them a little easier I can meet some of my grass goals of knocking back cool season grasses and I can have healthy calves on green grass it just really works for me and my operation it's a little less stress on everybody it works for well timing it with nature
